title: Schindelhauer Emil & Emilia are an ideal city e-bike, with Pinion gearbox & Gates belt drive
content:
Schindelhauer has given their Gustav & Greta porteur city bikes a major e-bike & gearbox upgrade as the new Emil & Emilia. By combining 6 or 9-speed Pinion gearboxes, a Gates belt drive, and the stealthy & smooth ebikemotion X35 powertrain, Emil & Emilia could be the perfect city e-bikes for cruising around town and [â€¦]

The post Schindelhauer Emil & Emilia are an ideal city e-bike, with Pinion gearbox & Gates belt drive appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
